fitnesse:shutdown

Full name:

uk.co.javahelp.fitnesse:fitnesse-launcher-maven-plugin:1.2.0:shutdown

Description:

Goal that shuts down FitNesse. This is done by sending GET to http://localhost:<port>/?responder=shutdown.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
port String - (no description)
Default value is: 9123.
User property is: fitnesse.port.

Parameter Details

port:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.port
  • Default: 9123
